page.title: 11METHODISTS AND ANGLICANS
page.content: Within the area, there are 3 Methodist Chapels and 1 Church of England.The Church is at Roche and the Chapels are at Whitemoor, Enniscaven and Trezaise. The Methodist Chapels are part of the Padstow Circuit of which there are 27 altogether with a membership of 440. Services are held each Sunday and each has a Sunday School.The usual Christian Festivals of Christmas, Easter, Whitsuntide, Harvest Thanksgiving and Anniversaries are observed.There are also special efforts for Overseas Missions, the National Children's Home, the Blind, tha Deaf, the Leprosy Mission, the Bible Society and Retired Ministers. Whitemoor Chapel has a group of ladies who are known as the Whitemoor Gospel Singers(16) who sing at various Chapels and for Charity.
